Question: Ruian Leimaisi Fitness Equipment Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ruian Leimaisi Fitness Equipment Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Treadmill

- Motor: 3.5HP
- Speed: 0.5-12.8km/h
- Incline: 0-15%
- Display: 10" LCD Touchscreen
- Programs: 12 preset programs
- Folding Design: Easy fold and unfold
- Safety Features: Emergency stop button, soft drop system
- Connectivity: Bluetooth, USB port
- User Weight Capacity: 150kg
- Warranty: 2 years
- Dimensions: 1850x820x1340mm
- Additional Features: Built-in speakers, heart rate sensors, water bottle holder
